for_sales.sales_text:
Built by Martin Heard in the early eighties, she had a major refit 2013/14 including a new coach roof, cabin interior and seperate heads.

  • New mast and standing rigging in 2018 ( Mast by Collers)
  • SKB sails
  • Darglow feathering prop
  • Hot and cold pressurised water system
  • Compressor cold box
  • Cooker with oven and grill
  • Split charge relay for batterys
  • Engine : Beta 38 with hydraulic gearbox
  • Electric Anchor winch
  • Standard Horizon VHF Clipper Echo and log
  • Clipper wind speed and direction indicator
  • 3 anchors
  • Warps Fenders
  • Mooring strops

Curently hauled out at Calstock Boat yard on the River Tamar.

boat.full_description: Built by Martin Heard in the early eighties, she had a major refit 2013/14 including a new coach roof, cabin interior and separate heads. Currently hauled out at Calstock. For sale record indicated that she 'bore the name' Margaret Burton
boat.name: Maggie B
